channel.title: If you were going to die in one hour
channel.description: What would you do if you knew you only had one more hour to live?

item.title: If you were going to die in one hour
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:62, topic:365277”][quote author=mapu link=topic=461480.msg3377208#msg3377208 date=1287708330]
But really i would probably just speak to the people I love before I died. Try to see whoever I can and be with them. That’s the only thing that really matters in this world. Your family.
[/quote]The MoparScape community is my family <3[/quote]
we luv u too babe <3

I’d do what Dallas Winston did. ‘Pull a empty gun out in front of the po po and get shot to death’ (NZ cops don’t carry guns)

Read full topic
item.source: If you were going to die in one hour

item.title: If you were going to die in one hour
item.dc:creator: @mapu mapu
item.description:
@mapu wrote:

`Aaron:

I would call everyone i loved and tell them goodbye, i’d have my last cigarette and lay down and wait.

Hit of Heroin tbh.

Read full topic
item.source: If you were going to die in one hour

item.title: If you were going to die in one hour
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

Would probably spend the first 55 minutes contemplating doing something, and then the last 5 calling myself an idiot for not doing it while I had the time.

Read full topic

item.description:
@mapu wrote:

runefreak10:

Kill myself. Whatever it is that’s killing me in an hour, I’ll beat it to it. Fuck yeah.

You would be successfully trolled. That’s exactly what it would want you to do.

item.source: If you were going to die in one hour

item.title: If you were going to die in one hour
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Godandjesus, post:54, topic:365277”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=461480.msg3377171#msg3377171 date=1287706967]

I am a strong believer in Christianity.

Just because you two don’t, doesn’t mean it’d be a waste of time.

[im]http://allotetraploid.se/wp-content/2007/08/christianity.JPG[/img]
[/quote]Read my sig.

I think we all know that those type of images (including the one in my sig) go to the extreme to make fun of a different religion, so there is no reason to take anything in them seriously.

Your point is?[/quote]That people shouldn’t take those religious images seriously, and posting them as a retort or derogatory remark to someone’s religion is pointless.

Read full topic
